text5: We welcome you to this space, where you will find relevant information about the Learning Unit Technologies for Web Application Development, corresponding to ESCOM's 2020 Syllabus.
text6: The objective of this platform is to provide resources of the subject units, such as activities, practices, tutorials or theoretical content that is required for each topic. Without further ado, we invite you to browse the resource, hoping it will be useful for your learning :)
